resources.string: Hotfoot is a Design Sprint Organizer (DSO). The purpose of this app is to help organize the contents of a Sprint. One of the cardinal rules of a Sprint is to refrain from using technology to minimize distraction. This app is to be used during breaks or after the day Sprint is over. You would use this app to store key notes and picture made during the Sprint to reference at a later time.
Below are a list of descriptions of who should make up your team Click on each title for more information.

The Decider is the most essential member of the team. This is the person that makes the executive decisions for the team. It is dire that this person make time on their calender to be involved in every step of the Sprint.

A Sprint is a 5 day Product Design method developed by the team at Google Ventures(GV). During this event a small team of experts collaborate to Map, Design, Prototype, and Test a product. The types of products that can be developed can be either tangible or abstract.

Today you and your team with map out your project. You must first establish a Long Term goal for the project, then list Sprint questions, create a design map and finally, pick a target customer for the product.
Enter the Target Customer(s) of Your Product:
Today you can your team will sketch out our design ideas. Begin Whiteboarding activities so you can visualize how your product will look and feel.
